import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Container, CardBody, Media, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import moment from "moment"; import helpers from "./helpers/followingRelated/following/helpers.js"; import _ from "lodash"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const { renderProfilePicVideo, redirectToHackersProfile } = helpers; const FriendsTab = ({ user }) => { const history = useHistory(); const [ cards, setCards ] = useState([]); const redirectToHackersProfile = (hackerID) => { console.log("redirectToHackersProfile ran..."); history.push(`/hacker/profile/individual/view/${hackerID}`); } useEffect(() => { setCards([...user.followingHackers, ...user.followingCompanies]); }, []) return (

These are the people that this user is 'following' & actively keeping-up-with!

 {cards.map((element, i) => { const bannerImage = _.has(element, "profileBannerImage") ? `${process.env.REACT_APP_ASSET_LINK}/${element.profileBannerImage.link}` : require(`../../../../../assets/images/other-images/img-cropper.jpg`); const profilePicture = _.has(element, "profilePicsVideos") && element.profilePicsVideos.length > 0 ? element.profilePicsVideos[element.profilePicsVideos.length - 1] : require(`../../../../../assets/images/avtar/4.jpg`); if (element.accountType === "hackers") { return (
{renderProfilePicVideo(profilePicture)}

{`${element.firstName} ${element.lastName}`}

{element.fullyVerified === true ? "FULLY-VERIFIED!" : "Un-Verified."}
Successful/Completed Jobs

{element.completedJobs} Jobs/Gigs Completed

{element.reviews.length > 0 ?
Review Count

{element.reviews.length} Reviews (Total)

:
Experience

{element.points} XP-Experience Points

}
Registration

Registered {moment(element.registrationDate).fromNow()}

 ); } else { return (
{renderProfilePicVideo(profilePicture)}

{`${element.firstName} ${element.lastName}`}

{element.fullyVerified === true ? "FULLY-VERIFIED!" : "Un-Verified."}
Successful/Completed Jobs

{element.completedJobs} Jobs/Gigs Completed

{element.reviews.length > 0 ?
Review Count

{element.reviews.length} Reviews (Total)

:
Experience

{element.points} XP-Experience Points

}
Registration

Registered {moment(element.registrationDate).fromNow()}

 ); } })} ); }; export default FriendsTab;
